title: Forever and a Day / Forever Starts Now
description: When Dimitri told his friend Mina he was never going to get married again, he was dead serious…After all, he had to focus on raising his small daughter Lilly now that he was her only living parent. Besides, there was no way he could endure another broken heart like the one his first wife’s passing gave him.Too bad life has other plans.Lilly’s teacher Emily is too young, too pretty, and too untouched by life’s darker moments to make any sense at all for him. She’s also too damn perfect to ignore. FOREVER AND A DAY is a contemporary romance novella ~ book 4.5 in the Second Chances series. Includes the bonus short story "Forever Starts Now."The Flynn and O’Connell sisters have gone through a lot to secure their happily-ever-afters. Now, one weekend and two big milestones will finally bring them all together again—in this sweet and funny conclusion to the Second Chances series.
author: Kristen Casey
